title.narrative: Promotion of ESD and GCED Concepts in Public Schools and Madrassas in Pakistan

description.narrative: UNESCO has been striving for promotion of target 4.7, which stresses the cultivation of positive connections between the individual, the community, nature and the world in line with humanitarian values that promote social cohesion and harmony through the attributes of compassion, peace, and respect for diversity. Mainstreaming religious institutions (Madrassas) in Pakistan is the Government's high priority, UNESCO intends to promote the notion of ESD and GCED in public schools/ madrassas education through specific interventions that advocates for inclusion of these humanistic values in learners in Madrassas. The project is directly related to UNESCO's 2030 Education for Sustainable Development framework and builds upon the Global Action Programme (GAP) on ESD 2015-2019.
